mapper.select: SELECT /* StBbTgtInfoMapper.getStBbTgtInfoList */ BBC_NO, ENTR_NO, SYS_REG_ID, SYS_REG_DTM, SYS_MOD_ID, SYS_MOD_DTM FROM ST_BB_TGT_INFO WHERE BBC_NO = #{bbcNo}

SELECT /* StBbTgtInfoMapper.getStBbTgtInfoListAddStUserBase */ A.ENTR_NO AS USER_ID, B.USER_NM, B.JOB_GRP_CD, FN_GET_CODENAME('UR002', B.JOB_GRP_CD) AS ORG_TYP_NM, B.WORK_STAT_CD, FN_GET_CODENAME('UR004', B.WORK_STAT_CD) AS WORK_STAT_NM FROM ST_BB_TGT_INFO AS A , ST_USER_BASE AS B WHERE A.BBC_NO = #{bbcNo} AND A.ENTR_NO = B.USER_ID
